App cast title (usually the name of the application)

App cast language (e.g. "en")

Functions

Create a new object with an empty list of  items

SetupAppCastHandler
public void SetupAppCastHandler(
IAppCastDataDownloader dataDownloader,
string castUrl,
Configuration config,
ISignatureVerifier signatureVerifier,
ILogger logWriter = null
)

Setup the app cast handler info for downloading and parsing app cast information

Parameters
dataDownloader
IAppCastDataDownloader

downloader that will manage the app cast download (provided by SparkleUpdater via the SparkleUpdater.AppCastDataDownloader property.

castUrl
string

full URL to the app cast file

config
Configuration

configuration for handling update intervals/checks (user skipped versions, etc.)

signatureVerifier
ISignatureVerifier

Object to check signatures of app cast information

logWriter
ILogger

object that you can utilize to do any necessary logging

DownloadAndParse
public bool DownloadAndParse()

Download castUrl resource and parse it

VerifyAppCast
private bool VerifyAppCast(
string appCast,
string signature
)
ParseAppCast
protected virtual void ParseAppCast(
string appCast
)

Parse the app cast XML string into a list of AppCastItem objects.  When complete, the Items list should contain the parsed information as AppCastItem objects.

Parameter
appCast
string

the non-null string XML app cast

GetAvailableUpdates
public virtual List<AppCastItem> GetAvailableUpdates()

Returns sorted list of updates between current installed version and latest version in Items.  Currently installed version is NOT included in the output.

Returns

A list of  updates that could be installed

GenerateAppCastXml
public static XDocument GenerateAppCastXml(
List<AppCastItem> items,
string title,
string link = "",
string description = "",
string language = "en"
)

Create app cast XML document as an  object

Parameters
items
List<AppCastItem>

The  list to include in the output file

title
string

Application title/title for the app cast

link
string

Link to the where the app cast is going to be downloaded

description
string

Text that describes the app cast (e.g. what it provides)

language
string

Language of the app cast file

Returns

An  xml document that describes the list of passed in update items
